summary: I am an economist who loves technology and has strong analytical, problem solving, and visualizing skills. I am ceaselessly looking for new, exciting challenges to solve. I have a good level of self-motivation in a wide range of topics and activities. If there is an impact at the end of a project, I can move mountains.

projects: [{'title': "ESET'12 case study training and competition", 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'After being responsible for the projects of the College as the COO, I decided to start a new type of professional event, namely a business case study training and a case study competition.\nI applied for the project leadership in July 2012 with a concept based on international benchmarks (e.g. CBS case competition). My team and I complied a case study training, organized it for more than 80 students, realized a very popular case study competition and involved several sponsors and professionals e.g. as members of the jury.\nI am very proud that the ESET brand of the College still exists and gains more and more popularity and reputation among Hungarian business students and teachers each year.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ákos', 'last_name': 'Matzon', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant | Payments, Mobility & Insights'}]}, {'title': 'Szakmarathon 2011', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': 'In 2011, I became the elected leader of the project named "Szakmarathon 2011". The project involved several sponsors and professional speakers from big firms such as Magyar Telekom, Nestlé, Procter&Gamble and KPMG.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ákos', 'last_name': 'Matzon', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant | Payments, Mobility & Insights'}]}]
